Loose Lists
.
- This is a list item

- This is a list item

1. This is a list item

2. This is a list item
.
<p class="li indent-1"><a ¶="1" id="¶1" href="#¶1">1</a>- This is a list item</p>
<p class="li indent-1"><a ¶="2" id="¶2" href="#¶2">2</a>- This is a list item</p>
<p class="li indent-1"><a ¶="3" id="¶3" href="#¶3">3</a>1. This is a list item</p>
<p class="li indent-1"><a ¶="4" id="¶4" href="#¶4">4</a>2. This is a list item</p>
.

Tight Lists
.
- This is a list item
- This is a list item
1. This is a list item
2. This is a list item
.
<p class="indent-1"><a ¶="1" id="¶1" href="#¶1">1</a><span class="li">- This is a list item</span>
<span class="li">- This is a list item</span>
</p>
<p class="indent-1"><a ¶="2" id="¶2" href="#¶2">2</a><span class="li">1. This is a list item</span>
<span class="li">2. This is a list item</span>
</p>
